text: Richard Anthony, also known as Ricardo Anthony Btesh (13 January 1938 – 19 April 2015), was a French singer from Cairo, Egypt. He was known for singing the soundtrack of A Good Year and for his small acting roles in Dallas and Star Trek: The Original Series. Anthony died in Pégomas, France, aged 77.Obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Egyptian singers Category:French singers Category:People from Bordeaux
title: Richard Anthony
